definition: demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal

sentences.english: Chongqing, a metropolis in the southwest of China, has set up an Anti-Cult Federation of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 中國西南的大都市重慶成立了重慶市反邪教聯合會。

sentences.english: However, we never praise cults for they encourage people to commit wrongdoings.
sentences.chinese: 如果是叫人造罪業墮三途的邪教，我們絕對不讚嘆。

sentences.english: Nothing strictly heretical could be charged against Montanism.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼可以收取嚴格邪教對孟他努。

sentences.english: Calling on relevant countries to support Chinese people's anti-cult efforts.
sentences.chinese: 第五，呼籲有關國家支持中國人民反邪教的鬥爭。

sentences.english: And the Big Bad is now a cultish society that Sophia Lamb operates.
sentences.chinese: 與大現在是一個邪教的社會，上智羔羊運作。

sentences.english: The cults borrow the religious name.
It was born amidst the last throes of expiring cults and civilizations in Western Asia and Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 這是由於出生的最後陣痛期邪教和文明在西亞和埃及。

sentences.english: Deception lies at the core of mind-manipulating cultic groups and programs.
sentences.chinese: 欺騙是使用心理控制技巧的邪教最常用的方法。

sentences.english: We've had Christian cults that have committed acts of violence;
sentences.chinese: 我們的基督教邪教實施了暴行，殺戮墮胎醫生。

sentences.english: Cults limit the outside information available to recruits and enmesh them in this alternate reality.
sentences.chinese: 邪教的限制外，並聘資料纏住他們在這候補現實。

sentences.english: Cults have some of the same characteristics as sects.
sentences.chinese: 邪教都有一些相同的特點，作爲支派。

sentences.english: Most importantly, the rampancy of cults has first done great harm to national interests.
sentences.chinese: 何況邪教猖獗首先就損害了本國利益。

sentences.english: We should learn from other countries, and make international co-operations and research in banning cults.
sentences.chinese: 借鑑國外做法，切實加強國際間反邪教合作和研究。

sentences.english: It is indeed unprecedented among the incidents of world cults.
sentences.chinese: 這在世界邪教所製造事件中也是沒有前例的。

sentences.english: The legislation can meet the need. The cooperation of international anti-vicious religion exist problems.
sentences.chinese: 立法滯後，反邪教國際合作等方面都存在着問題。

sentences.english: We've had Christian cults that have committed acts of violence; killings of abortion doctors. (Oklahoma City bomber Timothy) McVeigh.
sentences.chinese: 我們的基督教邪教實施了暴行，殺戮墮胎醫生。

definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
lit. true religion/orthodox religion/orthodox Christianity/Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)
remaining evil element/surviving members (of evil former regime)/dregs (of colonial administration)
